explains: n. 条款，约定（规定）的条件

sentences.en: Clifford's only stipulation is that his clients obey his advice.
sentences.cn: 克里弗德惟一的规定是他的客户必须听从自己的建议。

sentences.en: The only stipulation is that the topic you choose must be related to your studies.
sentences.cn: 唯一的要求是你选的题目必须与你的研究科目有关。

sentences.en: Its reciprocity is merely an added stipulation.
sentences.cn: 它的互惠只是一个附加的约定。
